string.name: android_market_description_text
string.translation_description: For the Android Market (not used in the app), the description text. Character limit: 4000.

resources.string:
Gebruik My Tracks tijdens het lopen, fietsen, wandelen of andere buitenactiviteiten. Hierbij wordt de GPS-sensor in uw telefoon gebruikt om de afgelegde route op te nemen. De app verzamelt ook nuttige statistieken, zoals tijd, snelheid, afstand en hoogteverschil. U kunt alle gegevens live bekijken of ze opslaan voor later gebruik. Onderweg kunt u relevante routepunten markeren. U kunt ook instellen dat gesproken berichten over uw voortgang worden afgespeeld.
 
 My Tracks kan gegevens registreren die afkomstig zijn van externe sensoren:
 - Zephyr Technology Consumer HxM Bluetooth-hartslagmeters
 - Polar Bluetooth-hartslagmeters
 - ANT+-hartslagmeters (*)
 - SRM-krachtmeters, snelheid- en trapfrequentiesensoren (*)
 - Binnenkort ondersteuning voor nog meer sensoren
 
 * Voor ANT+- en SRM-ondersteuning is een ANT+-compatibele telefoon vereist
 
 Met My Tracks kunt u uw routegegevens delen:
 - Als een GPX-, KML-, CSV- of TCX-bestand
 - Met behulp van Google Maps, Google Fusion Tables of Google Documenten
 - Via Twitter of Facebook
 
 Andere functies:
 - Gegevens registreren met metrische of Engelse eenheden (configureerbaar in het menu 'Opname' onder 'Instellingen')
 - Uw verplaatsing weergeven op basis van snelheid of tempo (configureerbaar in het menu 'Scherm' onder 'Instellingen')
 
 My Tracks is een open-sourceproject. Als u wilt bijdragen, gaat u naar:
 
 http://mytracks.googlecode.com

string.translation_description: For the Android Market (not used in the app), the promotion text. Character limit: 80.

string.translation_description: In the 'Terms of service' dialog, the button to accept. Screenshot: eula.png

string.name: eula_decline
string.translation_description: In the 'Terms of service' dialog, the button to decline. Screenshot: eula.png

string.name: eula_message_body
string.translation_description: The body in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

resources.string: Als u gebruiktmaakt van de mobiele producten en services van Google (de \'Services\'), gaat u akkoord met het volgende:

string.name: eula_message_date
string.translation_description: The date in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

string.name: eula_message_footer
string.translation_description: The footer in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. %1$s: host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: De Services kunnen inhoud van derden bevatten. Eventuele vereiste toekenningen of kennisgevingen voor de inhoud van derden is te vinden op %1$s/legalnotices.

string.name: eula_message_header
string.translation_description: The header in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

string.name: eula_message_item1
string.translation_description: The first item in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. %1$s: host name, 'm.google.com' %2$s: host name, 'm.google.com' %3$s: host name, 'm.google.com' %4$s: host name, 'm.google.com' %5$s: host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: Ga akkoord met deze voorwaarden en a) de Gebruiksvoorwaarden van YouTube (%1$s/tos_youtube) voor YouTube-gerelateerde services, b) de Algemene voorwaarden van Google Maps (%2$s/tos_maps) voor kaarten, lokale services en locatie-gebaseerde services, c) de Algemene voorwaarden van Google Buzz voor Buzz-gerelateerde services (%3$s/tos_buzz), d) de Algemene voorwaarden van Google Boeken(%4$s/tos_books) voor aan Google Boeken gerelateerde services, en e) de Servicevoorwaarden van Google (%5$s/utos) voor alle andere services, die van tijd tot tijd worden bijgewerkt. U mag de services van Google alleen gebruiken zoals uiteengezet in deze overeenkomsten. Gebruik deze services niet tijdens het rijden.

string.name: eula_message_item2
string.translation_description: The second item in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

resources.string: U erkent en gaat ermee akkoord dan derden Services kunnen aanbieden, en dat u daardoor onder de voorwaarden van deze derden kunt vallen en zij u hieraan kunnen houden. Google is niet verantwoordelijk voor wijzigingen die derden aanbrengen in de Services.

string.name: eula_message_item3
string.translation_description: The third item in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry. %1$s: host name, 'm.google.com'

resources.string: U gaat akkoord met het verzamelen, gebruiken, delen en doorsturen van uw gegevens, waaronder gespreks- en locatiegegevens, zoals vastgelegd in ons Privacybeleid voor mobiel (%1$s/privacy). Locatiegegevens kunnen afkomstig zijn van verschillende bronnen en daarom niet geheel nauwkeurig zijn. Het gebruik is voor eigen risico.

string.name: eula_message_item4
string.translation_description: The fourth item in the Google mobile terms of service. See http://m.google.com/toscountry.

resources.string: Houd er rekening mee dat voor bepaalde Services een telefoon- of dataverbinding of sms-mogelijkheden nodig zijn. Tenzij anders vermeld, berekent Google geen kosten voor de Services, maar uw provider kan wel kosten in rekening brengen voor het telefoon-, data- en sms-verkeer.

E.g., '1'. %2$s the number of GPX files in the SD card. E.g., '1 GPX file' or '2 GPX files'. %3$s the SD card directory path. E.g., '/mnt/sdcard/MyTracks/gpx/'. Screenshot: import_success.png

resources.string: GPS is niet beschikbaar. Er wordt een geschatte locatie op basis van zendmasten en wifi-netwerken weergegeven.

string.name: my_location_no_location
string.translation_description: When displaying the user's current location, a status message indicating that the current location cannot be determined. Screenshot: my_location_no_location.png

resources.string: GPS is niet beschikbaar. Huidige locatie kan niet worden bepaald. Schakel meer locatiebronnen in (zie \'Locatie en beveiliging\' in de instellingen) en zorg ervoor dat de hemel zichtbaar is. Probeer het later opnieuw.

string.name: my_maps_list_error
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, the text on the 'Maps' list page informing the user that his maps cannot be loaded at this time.

resources.string: Uw kaarten kunnen momenteel niet worden geladen.

string.name: my_maps_list_loading
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, the progress dialog message informing the user that his maps are being loaded.

string.name: my_maps_list_no_maps
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, the text on the 'Maps' list page informing the user that he doesn't have any maps. Screenshot: my_maps_list_no_maps.png

string.name: my_maps_list_pick_map
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, the text on the 'Maps' list page asking the user to pick one of his maps. Screenshot: my_maps.png

string.name: my_maps_list_public_label
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, in the 'Maps' list page, the label next to the maps that are public, as opposed to being unlisted. Screenshot: my_maps.png

string.name: my_maps_list_title
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, the title of the page listing the user's maps in Google Maps. Screenshot: my_maps.png

string.name: my_maps_list_unlisted_label
string.translation_description: When sending a track to an existing Google Map, in the 'Maps' list page, the label next to the maps that are unlisted, as opposed to being public. Screenshot: my_maps.png

string.name: my_tracks_app_name
string.translation_description: The My Tracks application name.

string.name: my_tracks_importer
string.translation_description: When opening a GPX file from a file manager, the name of the My Tracks application that can import the file to My Tracks. Screenshot: my_tracks_importer.png

string.name: my_tracks_recording_service
string.translation_description: When viewing the 'Running services' on Android, the name of the My Tracks service that is recording a track in the background. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: my_tracks_recording_service.png

string.name: permission_notification_description
string.translation_description: When installing a third-party app that wants to receive My Tracks notifications, the permission description that the Android Market shows to the user. Screenshot: permission_detail_top.png

resources.string: Toestaan dat de app meldingen ontvangt wanneer My Tracks een opname start of stopt.

string.name: permission_notification_label
string.translation_description: When installing a third-party app that wants to receive My Tracks notifications, the permission label that the Android Market shows to the user. Screenshot: permission.png

string.name: permission_read_description
string.translation_description: When installing a third-party app that wants to read My Tracks data, the permission description that the Android Market shows to the user. Screenshot: permission_detail_top.png

resources.string: De app toestaan om My Tracks-gegevens te lezen.

string.name: permission_read_label
string.translation_description: When installing a third-party app that wants to read My Tracks data, the permission label that the Android Market shows to the user. Screenshot: permission.png

string.name: permission_write_description
string.translation_description: When installing a third-party app that wants to write data to My Tracks, the permission description that the Android Market shows to the user. Screenshot: permission_detail_bottom.png

resources.string: De app toestaan om gegevens naar My Tracks te schrijven en My Tracks-opnamen te starten of te stoppen.

string.name: permission_write_label
string.translation_description: When installing a third-party app that wants to write data to My Tracks, the permission label that the Android Market shows to the user. Screenshot: permission.png

resources.string: gegevens naar My Tracks schrijven en My Tracks-opnamen starten of stoppen

string.name: preferred_units_imperial
string.translation_description: In the dialog asking the user to choose a preferred units, the option to choose the imperial units. Screenshot: preferred_units.png

string.name: preferred_units_metric
string.translation_description: In the dialog asking the user to choose a preferred units, the option to choose the metric units. Screenshot: preferred_units.png

string.name: preferred_units_title
string.translation_description: The title of the dialog asking the user to choose a preferred units, metric or imperial. Screenshot: preferred_units.png

string.name: sd_card_canceled
string.translation_description: When exporting a track to the SD card, a message indicating that the export operation was canceled. Screenshot: sd_card_canceled.png

string.name: sd_card_error_create_dir
string.translation_description: When writing to the SD card, the error message when not able to create a directory on the SD card.

resources.string: Kan geen map maken op de SD-kaart.

string.name: sd_card_error_no_storage
string.translation_description: When writing to the SD card, the error message when the SD card is not found.

resources.string: Geen externe opslag gevonden. Zorg ervoor dat er een SD-kaart is geplaatst en dat uw telefoon niet is aangesloten op een computer.

string.name: sd_card_error_read_file
string.translation_description: When reading from the SD card, the error message when not able to read a file.

resources.string: Kan niet lezen uit een bestand.

string.name: sd_card_error_write_file
string.translation_description: When writing to the SD card, the error message when not able to write a file.

resources.string: Kan niet schrijven naar een bestand.

string.name: sd_card_progress_write_file
string.translation_description: When writing to the SD card, the progress dialog message indicating that it may take a while. Screenshot: sd_card_progress_write_file.png

resources.string: De track wordt naar de SD-kaart geëxporteerd. Dit kan even duren.

string.name: sd_card_success_read_file
string.translation_description: When reading from the SD card, the success message when finish reading from the SD card. Screenshot: sc_card_success_read_file.png

resources.string: Lezen van de SD-kaart is voltooid.

string.name: sd_card_success_write_file
string.translation_description: When writing to the SD card, the success message when finish writing to the SD card. Screenshot: sd_card_success_write_file.png

resources.string: Schrijven naar de SD-kaart is voltooid.

string.name: send_google_by_my_tracks
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, a note indicating it is created by My Tracks on Android. %1$s: the html anchor opening tag. Place this placeholder before the app name, 'My Tracks'. %2$s: the html anchor closing tag. Place this placeholder after the app name, 'My Tracks'.

string.name: send_google_choose_account_title
string.translation_description: When sending to Google, the dialog title to choose a Google account. Screenshot: send_google_choose_account.png

string.name: send_google_docs
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, under the 'Send to...' dialog, the checkbox option to send to Google Docs. Screenshot: send_google_choose_service.png

string.name: send_google_error
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, a message indicating that an error has occurred and ask the user to try again.

resources.string: Er is een fout opgetreden. Probeer het opnieuw.

string.name: send_google_existing_map
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Maps, the radio option to use an existing map as opposed to create a new map. Screenshot: send_google_choose_service.png

string.name: send_google_fusion_tables
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, under the 'Send to...' dialog, the checkbox option to send to Google Fusion Tables. Screenshot: send_google_choose_service.png

string.name: send_google_my_maps
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, under the 'Send to...' dialog, the checkbox option to send to Google Maps. Screenshot: send_google_choose_service.png

string.name: send_google_new_map
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Maps, the radio option to create a new map as opposed to use an existing map. Screenshot: send_google_choose_service.png

string.name: send_google_no_account_message
string.translation_description: When sending to Google, the dialog message when no Google account is found.

resources.string: Geen account gevonden om routes naar te uploaden.

string.name: send_google_no_account_title
string.translation_description: When sending to Google, the dialog title when no Google account is found.

string.name: send_google_progress_authenticating
string.translation_description: When sending a track to a Google service, the message on the progress dialog indicating authenticating to the service. %1$s: service name. 'Google Maps', 'Google Fusion Tables', or 'Google Docs'.

string.name: send_google_progress_creating
string.translation_description: When sending a track to a Google service, the message on the progress dialog indicating creating a new service item. %1$s: service name. 'Google Maps', 'Google Fusion Tables', or 'Google Docs'.

string.name: send_google_progress_preparing_track
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Maps, the message on the progress dialog indicating My Tracks is preparing the track's data for upload.

string.name: send_google_progress_reading_track
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the message on the progress dialog indicating My Tracks is reading the track from its database.

string.name: send_google_progress_sending
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google service, the message on the progress dialog indicating My Tracks is sending the track data. %1$s: service name. 'Google Maps', 'Google Fusion Tables', or 'Google Docs'.

string.name: send_google_recorded
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, in the track description, a tag for the track recorded date. E.g., 'Recorded: Tue Sep 06 15:08:30 PDT 2011'.

string.name: send_google_result_header
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the header on the top of the result page. Screenshot: send_google_success.png

string.name: send_google_result_share_url
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, in the result dialog, the button on the bottom to share with friends the URL of the uploaded track. Screenshot: send_google_success.png

string.name: send_google_send_now
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, under the 'Send to...' dialog, the button on the bottom to send the track to the selected Google services. Screenshot: send_google_choose_service.png

string.name: send_google_success_footer
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the additional comment on the bottom of the result page. Screenshot: send_google_success.png

resources.string: Het kan enkele minuten duren voordat nieuwe routes worden weergegeven.

string.name: send_google_title
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the dialog title to choose the Google services to send the track to. The user can choose Google Maps, Google Fusion Tables, and Google Docs. Screenshot: send_google_choose_service.png

string.name: send_google_track_part_label
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the label to name segments when splitting a large track. %1$d: part number. E.g., '1'.

string.name: sensor_state_battery
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the battery level on the bike sensor. E.g, 'Battery level: 50 %'. Screenshot: sensor_state_none.png

string.name: sensor_state_battery_value
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the value for the 'Battery level'. E.g, 'Battery level: 50 %'. %1$d: a number. E.g., '50'. %%: escape sequence for the '%' character.

string.name: sensor_state_cadence
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the cadence on the bike sensor. Cadence is the number of revolutions of the crank per minute. E.g., 'Cadence: 80 rpm'. Screenshot: sensor_state_none.png

string.name: sensor_state_cadence_value
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the value for the 'Cadence'. Cadence is the number of revolutions of the crank per minute. E.g., 'Cadence: 80 rpm'. %1$d: a number. E.g., '80'.

string.name: sensor_state_connected
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the 'Sensor state' value when the sensor has connected. Screenshot: sensor_state_connected.png

string.name: sensor_state_connecting
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the 'Sensor state' value when the sensor is connecting. Screenshot: sensor_state_connecting.png

string.name: sensor_state_disconnected
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the 'Sensor state' value when the sensor has disconnected. Screenshot: sensor_state_disconnected.png

string.name: sensor_state_heart_rate
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the heart rate from a heart rate sensor. E.g., 'Hear rate: 100 bpm'. Screenshot: sensor_state_none.png

string.name: sensor_state_heart_rate_value
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the value for the 'Heart rate'. E.g., 'Hear rate: 100 bpm'. %1$d: a number. E.g., '100'.

string.name: sensor_state_last_sensor_time
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the last time the sensor has sent a data. E.g., 'Last sensor time: 10:05 am'. Screenshot: sensor_state_none.png

string.name: sensor_state_power
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the label for the power from the bike sensor. Power is the power output of the rider. E.g., 'Power: 50 W'. Screenshot: sensor_state_none.png

string.name: sensor_state_power_value
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the value for the 'Power'. Power is the power output of the rider. E.g., 'Power: 50 W'. %1$d: a number. E.g., '50'.

string.name: sensor_state_sending
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor state' page, the 'Sensor state' value when the sensor is sending data. Screenshot: sensor_state_sending.png

string.name: settings_backup
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the option to change the data backup related settings. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings.png

string.name: settings_backup_now
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, under the 'SD card backup' section, the option to backup to the SD card now. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_backup.png

string.name: settings_backup_now_progress_message
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, after pressing the 'Backup now' option, the progress dialog telling the user that it is writing all tracks and settings and that it may take a while. Screenshot: settings_backup_now_progress_message.png

resources.string: Alle routes en instellingen worden naar de SD-kaart geschreven. Dit kan even duren.

string.name: settings_backup_now_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, under the 'SD card backup' section, the summary for the 'Backup now' option explaining that all tracks and settings will be written to the SD card. Screenshot: settings_backup.png

resources.string: Een volledige kopie van al uw tracks en instellingen naar de SD-kaart schrijven.

string.name: settings_backup_restore
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, under the 'SD card backup' section, the option to restore everything from the SD card. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_backup.png

string.name: settings_backup_restore_confirm_message
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, after pressing the 'Restore now' option, the message in the alert dialog asking the user to confirm that he wants to restore from a backup and it will overwrite all the current tracks and settings. Screenshot: settings_backup_restore_confirm_message.png

resources.string: Wanneer u een back-up terugzet vanaf de SD-kaart, worden al uw huidige routes en instellingen overschreven. Weet u het zeker?

string.name: settings_backup_restore_no_backup
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, after pressing the 'Restore now' option, the message in the alert dialog informing the user that there is no backup to restore from. Screenshot: settings_backup_restore_no_backup.png

string.name: settings_backup_restore_progress_message
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, after pressing the 'Restore now' option, the message on the progress dialog indicating that My Tracks is reading all tracks and settings from the backup on the SD card and that it may take a while. Screenshot: settings_backup_restore_progress.png

resources.string: Alle routes en instellingen worden vanaf de SD-kaart gelezen. Dit kan even duren.

string.name: settings_backup_restore_select_title
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, after pressing the 'Restore now' option, the title in the picker dialog asking the user to select a backup. Screenshot: settings_backup_restore_select_title.png

resources.string: Selecteer de back-up die u wilt terugzetten

string.name: settings_backup_restore_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, under the 'SD card backup' section, the summary for the 'Restore now' option explaining that it restores all tracks and settings from the SD card. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_backup.png

resources.string: Alle routes en instellingen terugzetten vanaf de SD-kaart.

string.name: settings_backup_sd_card
string.translation_description: In the 'Backup' settings, the section header for configuring backup to the SD card. Character limit: ~40 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_backup.png

string.name: settings_display
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the option to change the display related settings. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings.png

string.name: settings_display_metric
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the checkbox option to use the metric units. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_metric_summary_off
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the summary for the 'Use metric units' checkbox when it is unchecked explaining using the imperial units to display distances. Screenshot: settings_display_unchecked.png

resources.string: Engelse eenheden gebruiken om afstanden weer te geven.

string.name: settings_display_metric_summary_on
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the summary for the 'Use metric units' checkbox when it is checked explaining using the metric units to display distances. Screenshot: settings_display.png

resources.string: Metrische eenheden gebruiken om afstanden weer te geven.

string.name: settings_display_speed
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the checkbox option to display speed (e.g., 5 miles per hour) instead of pace (e.g., 0.2 hours per mile). Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_speed_summary_off
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the summary for the 'Display speed' checkbox when it is unchecked explaining that pace (e.g., 0.2 hours per mile) will be used instead of speed (e.g., 5 miles per hour). Screenshot: settings_display_unchecked.png

string.name: settings_display_speed_summary_on
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the summary for the 'Display speed' checkbox when it is checked explaining that speed (e.g., 5 miles per hour) will be used instead of pace (e.g., 0.2 hours per mile). Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the dropdown option to choose a track color mode for how to use different colors to color a track based on slow, medium, and fast speed. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_dynamic
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, for the 'Track color mode' dropdown, the option to use different colors to color a track based on dynamically determined speed thresholds. E.g., use one color when the speed is below the slow speed threshold. Character limit: ~21 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display_track_color_option.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_dynamic_medium
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Dynamic thresholds' configurations, the option for configuring the percentage from the average speed for the medium speed range. The track color mode will use different colors to color a track depending on whether the speed is above, in, or below the medium speed range. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_dynamic_medium_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Dynamic thresholds' configurations, the summary for the 'Percentage from average' option explaining that it sets the percentage from the average speed for the medium speed range. The track color mode will use different colors to color a track depending on whether the speed is above, in, or below the medium speed range. Screenshot: settings_display.png

resources.string: Percentage van de gemiddelde snelheid voor het bereik van middelmatige snelheid.

string.name: settings_display_track_color_fixed
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, for the 'Track color mode' dropdown, the option to use different colors to color a track based on fixed speed thresholds. E.g., use one color when the speed is below the slow speed threshold. Character limit: ~21 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display_track_color_option.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_fixed_medium
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Fixed thresholds' configurations, the option for configuring the medium speed threshold. Thus any speed lower than the threshold but greater than the slow speed threshold will be colored by the medium speed color. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_fixed_medium_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Fixed thresholds' configurations, the summary for the 'Medium speed threshold' option explaining that it sets a cutoff speed for the medium speed color. Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_fixed_slow
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Fixed thresholds' configurations, the option for configuring the slow speed threshold. Thus any speed lower than the threshold will be colored by the slow speed color. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_fixed_slow_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, under the 'Fixed thresholds' configurations, the summary for the 'Slow speed threshold' option explaining that it sets a cutoff speed for the slow speed color. Screenshot: settings_display.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_single
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, for the 'Track color mode' dropdown, the option to use a single color for all speeds. Character limit: ~21 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_display_track_color_option.png

string.name: settings_display_track_color_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Display' settings, the summary for the 'Track color mode' dropdown explaining that it configures how colors are used to color a track based on slow, medium, and fast speed. Screenshot: settings_display.png

resources.string: Tracks markeren met kleuren op basis van lage, gemiddelde en hoge snelheid.

string.name: settings_not_while_recording
string.translation_description: In settings, the summary for an option that is not available during a track recording. Screenshot: settings_not_while_recording.png

resources.string: Niet beschikbaar tijdens het opnemen van een route.

string.name: settings_recording
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the option to change the track recording related settings. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings.png

string.name: settings_recording_auto_resume
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the dropdown option to configure the timeout after which a recorded track will not be continued after phone reboot. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_recording_bottom.png

string.name: settings_recording_auto_resume_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Auto-resume timeout' dropdown option explaining that it configures the maximum time after which a previous recording will not be resumed after phone reboot. Screenshot: settings_recording_bottom.png

resources.string: Maximum tijd waarna het opnemen van een route niet wordt hervat nadat de telefoon opnieuw is opgestart.

string.name: settings_recording_default_activity
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the option to specify a new track's default activity type. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_recording_bottom.png

string.name: settings_recording_default_activity_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Default activity type' option explaining that it sets the default activity type for a new track. Screenshot: settings_recording_bottom.png

resources.string: Standaardtype activiteit voor een nieuwe route.

string.name: settings_recording_distance
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the dropdown option to configure the distance between two recorded points. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

string.name: settings_recording_distance_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Distance between points' dropdown option explaining that it configures the smallest distance between two recordings of your position. Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

resources.string: Kleinste afstand tussen twee opnamen van uw positie.

string.name: settings_recording_gps_accuracy
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the dropdown option to configure the required GPS accuracy. If a GPS position's accuracy is below the requirement, then it will not be used. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

string.name: settings_recording_gps_accuracy_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'GPS accuracy' dropdown option explaining that it configures the required accuracy for your position. If a GPS position's accuracy is below the requirement, then it will not be used. Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

resources.string: GPS-positie wordt genegeerd als deze niet nauwkeurig is.

string.name: settings_recording_interval
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the dropdown option to configure the time between two recorded points. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

string.name: settings_recording_interval_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Time between points' dropdown option explaining that it configures the smallest time interval between two recordings of your position. Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

resources.string: Kleinste tijdsinterval tussen twee opnamen van uw positie.

string.name: settings_recording_marker
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the dropdown option to configure the time or distance a new marker will be inserted. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

string.name: settings_recording_marker_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Marker frequency' dropdown option explaining that it configures the time or distance after which a new marker will be inserted. Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

resources.string: Tijd/afstand waarna een nieuwe markering wordt ingevoegd.

string.name: settings_recording_name
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the checkbox on whether the track should be named based on the track's start time or based on a number. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_recording_bottom.png

string.name: settings_recording_name_summary_off
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Use time for track name' checkbox when it is unchecked explaining using a number as the default track name. Screenshot: settings_recording_bottom_unchecked.png

resources.string: Een getalwaarde als de standaardroutenaam gebruiken.

string.name: settings_recording_name_summary_on
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Use time for track name' checkbox when it is checked explaining using the track's start time as the default track name. Screenshot: settings_recording_bottom.png

resources.string: De starttijd van de route als standaardroutenaam gebruiken.

string.name: settings_recording_track_distance
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the dropdown option to configure the distance between two tracks. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

string.name: settings_recording_track_distance_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Distance between tracks' dropdown option explaining that it configures the maximum distance for two recorded points for them to be still considered as the same track. Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

resources.string: Route wordt gesplitst als de afstand tussen twee opnamen van uw positie groter is dan deze waarde.

string.name: settings_recording_voice
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the dropdown option to configure the voice announcement frequency. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

string.name: settings_recording_voice_not_available
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Voice frequency' explaining that this option is not available on your Android phone. Screenshot: settings_recording_voice_not_available.png

resources.string: Gesproken berichten zijn niet beschikbaar op uw Android-telefoon.

string.name: settings_recording_voice_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Recording' settings, the summary for the 'Voice frequency' dropdown option explaining that it configures the time or distance between two voice announcements. Screenshot: settings_recording_top.png

resources.string: Tijd/afstand tussen de twee gesproken berichten.

string.name: settings_reset
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the option to reset everything to the defaults. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings.png

string.name: settings_reset_dialog_message
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, after pressing the 'Reset to defaults' option, the confirmation dialog asking the user to confirm reverting all settings to defaults. But the saved tracks will be preserved. Screenshot: settings_reset_dialog_message.png

resources.string: Al uw instellingen worden gewist en de standaardwaarden worden teruggezet. Opgeslagen routes worden behouden. Weet u het zeker?

string.name: settings_reset_done
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, after pressing the 'Reset to defaults' option, the confirmation dialog informing the user that all settings have been reverted to their defaults. Screenshot: settings_reset_done.png

resources.string: Voor alle instellingen zijn de standaardwaarden teruggezet.

string.name: settings_reset_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the summary for the 'Reset to defaults' option explaining reverting all the settings to the default values. Screenshot: settings.png

resources.string: Voor al uw instellingen de standaardwaarden terugzetten.

string.name: settings_sensor
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the option to change the sensor related settings. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings.png

string.name: settings_sensor_ant_not_paired
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the summary for 'Unpair ANT+ heart rate sensor' or 'Unpair SRM ANT+ bridge' when there no ANT+ device paired. Screenshot: settings_sensor.png

string.name: settings_sensor_ant_options
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the section header to configure the ANT+ options. Note that ANT+ is a radio standard. Character limit: ~40 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor.png

string.name: settings_sensor_ant_paired
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the summary for 'Unpair ANT+ heart rate sensor' or 'Unpair SRM ANT+ bridge' when there is an ANT+ device paired. %1$d: sensor id number. E.g., '1'. Screenshot: settings_sensor_ant_paired.png

string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the section header to configure the Bluetooth options. Character limit: ~40 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor.png

string.name: settings_sensor_bluetooth_pairing
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, under the 'Bluetooth options' configurations, the option to pair with a Bluetooth device. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor.png

string.name: settings_sensor_bluetooth_pairing_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, under the 'Bluetooth options' configurations, the summary for the 'Bluetooth pairing' option explaining that it will open the Android's Bluetooth settings to pair a device. Screenshot: settings_sensor.png

resources.string: Bluetooth-instellingen voor Android openen om een apparaat te koppelen.

string.name: settings_sensor_bluetooth_sensor
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, under the 'Bluetooth options' configurations, the dropdown option to pick a Bluetooth sensor. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor.png

string.name: settings_sensor_bluetooth_sensor_summary

resources.string: De Bluetooth-sensor om verbinding mee te maken.

string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the dropdown option to choose a sensor type. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor.png

string.name: settings_sensor_type_ant
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, for the 'Sensor type' dropdown, the option to connect to an ANT+ heart rate sensor. Note that ANT+ is a radio standard. Character limit: ~21 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor_type.png

string.name: settings_sensor_type_none

string.name: settings_sensor_type_polar
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, for the 'Sensor type' dropdown, the option to connect to a Polar bluetooth sensor. Do not translate Polar, the company name, but can translate Bluetooth, the radio standard. Character limit: ~21 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor_type.png

string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, for the 'Sensor type' dropdown, the option to connect to a SRM ANT+ bridge. Do not trasnlate SRM, the company name, but can translate ANT+, the radio standard, and bridge (network bridge). Character limit: ~21 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor_type.png

string.name: settings_sensor_type_summary
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, the summary for the 'Sensor type' option explaining that it is to configure the type of sensor to connect to. Screenshot: settings_sensor.png

resources.string: Het type sensor om verbinding mee te maken.

string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, for the 'Sensor type' dropdown, the option to connect to a Zephyr bluetooth sensor. Do not translate Zephyr, the company name, but can translate Bluetooth, the radio standard. Character limit: ~21 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor_type.png

string.name: settings_sensor_unpair_ant
string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, under the 'ANT+ options' configurations, the option to unpair an ANT+ heart rate sensor. Note that ANT+ is a radio standard. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor.png

string.translation_description: In the 'Sensor' settings, under the 'ANT+ options' configurations, the option to unpair a SRM ANT+ bridge. Do not trasnlate SRM, the company name, but can translate ANT+, the radio standard, and bridge (network bridge). Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sensor.png

string.name: settings_sharing
string.translation_description: In the 'Settings' page, the option to change the track sharing related settings. Character limit: ~26 (1 line) Screenshot: settings.png

string.name: settings_sharing_allow_access
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the checkbox option to allow third party apps access to the My Tracks data. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sharing.png

string.name: settings_sharing_allow_access_confirm_message
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, after checking the 'Allow access' checkbox, the confirmation dialog asking the user if he wants to allow other apps, including apps installed in the future, to control and access My Tracks data. In addition, no further notification of third party app access will be shown. Screenshot: settings_sharing_allow_access_confirm_message.png

resources.string: Weet u zeker dat u andere apps, inclusief toekomstige apps, (beheer)toegang wilt geven tot My Tracks-gegevens? U ontvangt hierover geen meldingen meer.

string.name: settings_sharing_allow_access_summary_off
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the summary for the 'Allow access' checkbox option when it is unchecked explaining that other apps cannot read, write, start/stop recording My Tracks data. Screenshot: settings_sharing_unchecked.png

resources.string: Andere apps kunnen My Tracks-gegevens niet lezen of schrijven en ook geen My Tracks-opnamen starten of stoppen.

string.name: settings_sharing_allow_access_summary_on
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the summary for the 'Allow access' checkbox option when it is checked explaining that other apps can read, write, start/stop recording My Tracks data. Screenshot: settings_sharing.png

resources.string: Andere apps kunnen My Tracks-gegevens lezen of schrijven en ook My Tracks-opnamen starten of stoppen.

string.name: settings_sharing_map_public
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the checkbox option to make a new map created in Google Maps public. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sharing.png

string.name: settings_sharing_map_public_summary_off
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the summary for the 'Make new maps public' checkbox option when it is unchecked explaining that new maps created in Google Maps will be unlisted, as opposed to public. Screenshot: settings_sharing_unchecked.png

resources.string: Nieuwe kaarten die worden gemaakt in Google Maps, niet openbaar maken.

string.name: settings_sharing_map_public_summary_on
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the summary for the 'Make new maps public' checkbox option when it is checked explaining that new maps created in Google Maps will be public, as opposed to unlisted. Screenshot: settings_sharing.png

resources.string: Nieuwe kaarten die worden gemaakt in Google Maps, openbaar maken.

string.name: settings_sharing_url_only
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the checkbox option to share only the URL, without any descriptive text, when sharing a URL with friends. Character limit: ~23 (1 line) Screenshot: settings_sharing.png

string.name: settings_sharing_url_only_summary_off
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the summary for the 'Share only URL' checkbox option when it is unchecked explaining that it will include descriptive text when sharing a URL with friends. Screenshot: settings_sharing_unchecked.png

resources.string: Beschrijvende tekst toevoegen wanneer u een URL deelt met vrienden.

string.name: settings_sharing_url_only_summary_on
string.translation_description: In the 'Sharing' settings, the summary for the 'Share only URL' checkbox option when it is checked explaining that it will remove any descriptive text when sharing a URL with friends. Screenshot: settings_sharing.png

resources.string: Beschrijvende tekst verwijderen wanneer u een URL deelt met vrienden.

string.name: voice_pace_per_mile
string.translation_description: For voice announcement, to say 'time per mile' like 'two hours 2 minutes per mile'. %1$s time. E.g., 'two hours 2 minutes'.

string.name: voice_seconds_zero

string.name: voice_template
string.translation_description: For the voice announcement, the template to make an announcement. %1$s: distance string. E.g., '1 mile' or '1.2 miles', '1 kilometer', '2.2 kilometers' %2$s: time string. E.g., '1 hour and 30 minutes' or '20 minutes 1 second' %3$s: speed/pace string. For speed, e.g., '2.2 miles per hour', '1 kilometer per hour'. For pace, e.g., '2 hours 1 minute per mile', '30 minutes 1 second per kilometer'.

resources.string: Totale afstand van My Tracks %1$s in %2$s in %3$s.

string.name: welcome_about
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the button on the bottom to open the 'About My Tracks' dialog. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_add_graph_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on adding graphs to the graphs view. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Selecteer in de grafiekweergave de opties \'Menu\' -> \'Grafiekinstellingen\'.

string.name: welcome_add_graph_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on adding graphs to the graphs view. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Hoe voeg ik meer grafieken toe?

string.name: welcome_app_navigation_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on app navigation. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Raak de kaart aan. De pijl-links en pijl-rechts worden weergegeven. Tik op deze pijlen om te schakelen tussen de kaart-, statistiek- en grafiekweergave.

string.name: welcome_app_navigation_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on app navigation. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Hoe kan ik de kaart-, statistiek- en grafiekweergave bekijken?

string.name: welcome_battery_life_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on battery life. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: De GPS-ontvanger verbruikt relatief veel stroom, dus een volledig opgeladen accu gaat doorgaans minder dan vijf uur mee. De levensduur van de accu hangt af van vele factoren, waaronder de signaalsterkte, leeftijd van de accu en het aantal taken dat tegelijkertijd wordt uitgevoerd. Het uitschakelen van enkele of alle telefoonradio\'s verlengt de levensduur van de accu. De beste resultaten worden verkregen met de telefoon in de vliegmodus.

string.name: welcome_battery_life_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on battery life. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Hoe lang gaat de accu mee bij het bijhouden van tracks?

string.name: welcome_data_connection_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on data connection. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Voor het bijhouden van GPS-tracks is geen mobiel signaal of gegevensverbinding nodig. Als u echter niet over een gegevensverbinding beschikt, wordt er geen kaart weergeven. In plaats daarvan ziet u een grijs scherm of een gedeelte van een kaart. U kunt tracks (weergegeven als eenvoudige lijnen) blijven bijhouden, zelfs wanneer er geen gegevensverbinding is.

string.name: welcome_data_connection_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on data connection. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Heb ik een telefoonsignaal en gegevensverbinding nodig om My Tracks te gebruiken?

string.name: welcome_delete_all_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on deleting all tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Menu -> Routes -> Alles verwijderen. Hiermee verwijdert u de opgenomen routes definitief uit het geheugen. Als u routes heeft opgeslagen op de SD-kaart, moet u ze afzonderlijk verwijderen. Routes die zijn geüpload naar Google Maps, Google Fusion Tables en Google Documenten moeten eveneens afzonderlijk worden verwijderd.

string.name: welcome_delete_all_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on deleting all tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Hoe verwijder ik alle tracks uit de telefoon?

string.name: welcome_edit_accuracy_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on editing points. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Wanneer u routes uploadt naar Google Maps, Google Fusion Tables of Google Documenten, kunt u zo nodig individuele routepunten verplaatsen, verwijderen of invoegen.

string.name: welcome_edit_accuracy_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on editing points. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Hoe kan ik tracks bewerken of corrigeren voor meer nauwkeurigheid?

string.name: welcome_elevation_precision_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on elevation precision. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: GPS-ontvangers meten hoogteverschillen veel minder nauwkeurig dan lengte- en breedtegraad. Hoogteverschillen kunnen soms met enkele tientallen meters afwijken, hoewel de relatieve verschillen beter worden bijgehouden. Voor een ​​goede hoogtemeting zorgt u dat er een sterk GPS-signaal is en wacht u een paar minuten totdat de mate van het hoogteverschil correct is geregistreerd.

string.name: welcome_elevation_precision_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on elevation precision. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_gps_fix_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on the GPS fix message. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Als u My Tracks wilt gebruiken, moet uw telefoon onbelemmerd contact kunnen leggen met GPS-satellieten. Als deze gezichtslijn wordt belemmerd door bomen, gebouwen of ravijnwanden, krijgt u mogelijk geen accurate locatiebepaling. Als het bericht wordt weergegeven, wacht u een paar minuten. Als uw apparaat geen locatie kan bepalen, zoekt u een open plek en probeert u het opnieuw.

string.name: welcome_gps_fix_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on the GPS fix message. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Waarom geeft de applicatie soms de melding weer dat er wordt gewacht op een betere GPS-bepaling en dat ik ervoor moet zorgen dat ik de lucht kan zien?

string.name: welcome_location_precision_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on location precision. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Onder optimale omstandigheden kan de locatieafwijking ongeveer 6 meter zijn. De nauwkeurigheid is echter afhankelijk van de kwaliteit van het GPS-signaal. Met de blauwe cirkel rond de oranje locatiepijl wordt de geschatte nauwkeurigheid weergegeven. (U moet mogelijk in- of uitzoomen om de cirkel te zien.) U kunt de nauwkeurigheid van het GPS-signaal wijzigen via \'Instellingen\' -> \'Bijhouden\' -> \'GPS-nauwkeurigheid\'. Als de locatie niet nauwkeurig genoeg is, wordt boven aan het scherm het bericht weergeven dat u moet wachten op een betere GPS-bepaling.

string.name: welcome_location_precision_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on location precision. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Hoe nauwkeurig zijn de bijgehouden tracks?

string.name: welcome_my_maps_sharing_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on Google Maps visibility. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Nieuwe kaarten zijn standaard openbaar. Als u de standaardinstelling wilt wijzigen in \'Niet openbaar\', Gaat u naar \'Instellingen\' en schakelt u \'Nieuwe kaarten openbaar maken\' uit bij \'Delen\'. U kunt de zichtbaarheid van al uw kaarten wijzigen bij \'Mijn kaarten\' in Google Maps.

string.name: welcome_my_maps_sharing_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on Google Maps visibility. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Wie kan de kaarten zien die ik verzend naar Google Maps?

string.name: welcome_my_tracks_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on what is My Tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Met My Tracks kunt u GPS-routes opnemen en uw wandel-, hardloop-, fiets- en andere activiteiten visualiseren terwijl u live statistieken van uw prestaties bekijkt. U kunt uw trainingsgeschiedenis in My Tracks makkelijk archiveren met behulp van Google Maps, Google Fusion Tables en Google Documenten. Bovendien kunt u uw activiteiten eenvoudig delen met vrienden en de wereld.

string.name: welcome_my_tracks_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on what is My Tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_send_google_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on sending a track to Google. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Tik op de knop \'Opties\' in de rechterbenedenhoek van de kaartweergave en selecteer \'Verzenden naar Google...\'.

string.name: welcome_send_google_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on sending a track to Google. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Hoe verzend ik mijn routes naar Google Maps, Google Fusion Tables en Google Documenten?

string.name: welcome_share_file_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on sharing a file. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: U kunt gebruikmaken van Google Earth of soortgelijke applicaties voor het visualiseren en bewerken van GPS-tracks.

string.name: welcome_share_file_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on sharing a file. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Wat kan ik met de tracks doen nadat ik deze heb opgeslagen op de SD-kaart of dergelijke bestanden met vrienden heb gedeeld?

string.name: welcome_share_friends_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on sharing a track with friends. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Tik op de knop \'Opties\' in de rechterbenedenhoek van de kaartweergave en selecteer \'Delen met vrienden...\'. U kunt de route delen als een link naar Google Maps of Google Fusion Tables (u wordt gevraagd de route eerst te uploaden) of als een GPX-, KML-, CSV- of TCX- bestand in een e-mailbijlage.

string.name: welcome_share_friends_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on sharing a track with friends. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Hoe deel ik tracks met vrienden en de rest van de wereld?

string.name: welcome_split_track_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on splitting long tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Voor routes in Google Maps en Google Fusion Tables gelden bepaalde beperkingen voor de grootte.

string.name: welcome_split_track_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on splitting long tracks. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Waarom worden zeer lange routes in meerdere segmenten gesplitst wanneer ze naar Google Maps en Google Fusion Tables worden verzonden?

string.name: welcome_statistics_marker_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on statistics markers. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Statistiekmarkeringen worden gebruikt voor het segmenteren van een track, zodat voor elk segment statistieken kunnen worden berekend. Wanneer u bijvoorbeeld een fietstocht registreert waarbij u bergop gaat, kunt u onder en boven aan de heuvel een statistiekmarkering plaatsen door op \'Menu\' -> \'Markeringen\' -> \'Statistieken invoegen\' te klikken.

string.name: welcome_statistics_marker_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on statistics markers. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_title
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the title of the page. Screenshot: welcome.png

string.name: welcome_waypoint_marker_answer
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content answer on waypoint markers. Screenshot: welcome.png

resources.string: Routepuntmarkeringen worden gebruikt als annotatie van een ​​locatie. Als u zich tijdens het registeren van een track bijvoorbeeld in de buurt van een interessante plaats bevindt, drukt u op \'Menu\' -> \'Markeringen\' -> \'Routepunt invoegen\'.

string.name: welcome_waypoint_marker_question
string.translation_description: In the 'Welcome' page, the help content question on waypoint markers. Screenshot: welcome.png
